Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. After careful consideration and evaluation of its worth, I am offering it to you at a special price. I am confident that this product will meet your needs and expectations, providing significant value to you at a cost that reflects its true worth. Considering its significance and the benefits it offers, I propose a purchase price of $950,000. This offer allows you to secure this exceptional product at a premium quality-to-price ratio. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of conducting this transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
